attributes.action: Make An equalities minister so it is not sexist to men
attributes.additional_details:
Men do not feel comfortable contacting the womens minster with their problems they should have the option to contact a male or female.
It is better to learn lessons now and not later.
attributes.background:
We would like an equalities minister so it is equal for both men and women.
As it stands it is sexist and looks one sided, a men and equalities minister was refused hence leaving it one sided.
We should have an equalities minister run by a man and a woman.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept your petition because it appears to be based on a misunderstanding of the current ministerial portfolio. The Minister for Women and Equalities has responsibility for developing an equalities policy that it is based on individual autonomy and dignity, and promoting equality of opportunity for everyone. The Minister does not have a particular role in relation to policy issues affecting women.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to take action to address specific policy issues that affect men, such as those you outline in your petition.
